content: make every walk in the park a cheerful experience with this spirited knit dog sweater stitched in our machine wash and dry red heart super saver o go you ll work this garment in one piece beginning at the back with a center belly seam pattern features cozy 2 x 2 ribbing with shaping and a generous collar you ll also practice stocking stitch plus increases and decreases to complete this pup-approved project materials size u s 7 4 5 mm circular knitting needle 24 60 5 cm long set of 4 size u s 7 4 5 mm double-pointed knitting needles sizes to fit chest measurement s 10 25 5 cm m 14 35 5 cm l 17 43 cm finished chest s 12 30 5 cm m 16½ 42 cm l 19 48 cm collar to tail center back measurement s 123/4 32 5 cm m 151/2 39 5 cm l 191/2 49 5 cm yarns for models materials red heart® super saver® o go™ prints 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m sizes s m l rainbow 7192 or forest 7136 1 2 2 o go s
